description:
In May we organize an evening where we invite everyone interested in Semantic Technology – as creators and/or users.

Anyone wishing to present a topic – whether it be projects or technologies - can reserve the floor for a slot of 10 minutes.

After every topic we reserve some time for vivid discussions and bright feedback. The goal is to exchange thoughts in an informal atmosphere.

Sample topics can include
• Semantic Technology Business Applications
• Semantic Web Services
• Linked Data for Business
• Open Data for Government
• Data Integration using RDF
• Content Management using SKOS

Several speakers already confirmed to give a talk!
• JOHAN DE SMET – SKOS & RDF to classify European Data – pitch of his SemTech 2010 talk in San Francisco

• STIJN CHRISTIAENS – Business semantics: business definitions driving IT integration


All this will be in an informal and relaxed atmosphere, we provide drinks and tidbits. No need to bring anything but your fresh open minded spirit.


PLEASE REPLY
• IF you want to attend the Semantic Meetup on May 17
• IF you want to give a talk, specifying the subject
• IF you are interested in such a Semantic Meetup, but the date doesn’t fit
name: Semantic Meetup Brussels

description:
After a first successful edition in Brussels, it's time for the rest of the Benelux. Amsterdam is up next!

The informal talks and short speeches we had in Brussels were more fertile than we ever could have imagined. Seen how lively Semantic Technology is in the Netherlands, we expect this meetup to be even more promising...

We want to bring together everyone interested in Semantic Technology – as creators and/or users - to stimulate new developments. The focus is on bridging academic research to business applications, as we strongly believe this is the way to push Semantic Web technology up the Gartner curve.


Anyone wishing to present a topic – whether it be projects or technologies - can reserve the floor for a slot of 10 minutes.

After every topic we reserve some time for vivid discussions and bright feedback. The goal is to exchange thoughts in an informal atmosphere.

Sample topics can include
• Semantic Technology Business Applications
• Semantic Web Services
• Linked Data for Business
• Open Data for Government
• Data Integration using RDF
• Content Management using SKOS


All this will be in an informal and relaxed atmosphere, there'll tidbits and fresh Belgian beers. No need to bring anything but your fresh open minded spirit.

PLEASE REPLY
• IF you want to attend the Semantic Meetup on June 29
• IF you want to give a talk, specifying the subject
• IF you are interested in such a Semantic Meetup, but the date doesn’t fit

* Read the blog about our previous meetup in Brussel, or take a look at our Semantic Belgium LinkedIn group.
name: Semantic Meetup Amsterdam
how_to_find_us: Very close Amsterdam Central Station. Good route descriptions at http://www.brakkegrond.nl/bereikbaarheid.htm.

description:
Just an informal get-together in an Amsterdam pub. We invite all Semanticians who want to get to know each other better.

Exact location to be announced shortly... or send us your prefered place!

Note: There will be a pre-meetup at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam between 14h30 and 16h30.
Please, let us know if you plan to attend this as well.
name: Informal Amsterdam Meetup

description: The goal of this event is to show what Open Data can do for local governments. Find all about the event at  http://tenforce.com/blog/leuven-open-data
name: Leuven Open Data

description:
Waking up the Semantic Technology Benelux Meetup group.

Some of us are going to SEMANTiCS Leipzig 2014. Could be a nice place to have a first Meetup for the Benelux Semantic Technology group. We could be to have dinner on

Tuesday, September 2 around 18:30 (after the seminars)


If I see correctly, that is the only evening that there is not already a Social event planned:

* Sept 3 has a Meetup by the Berlin Semantic Web Group:

http://www.meetup.com/The-Berlin-Semantic-Web-Meetup-Group/events/187063262/

* Sept 4 has the Conference Dinner.

Please RSVP or send a message if interested or if you have an alternative proposal. Location is undecided for now. I presume we will find a suitable restaurant and make a reservation once arrived in Leipzig?

Thanks, Peter Vandenabeele

http://vandenabeele.com
name: Dinner at SEMANTiCS Leipzig 2014
